plot: Missing people at Wellington Zoo could be the work of a new creature that came from the future. Helen reappears offering to help but Lester and Claudia are suspicious of her true intentions.

Helen reappears to offer her help in tracking down a super-predator that she claims came from the future through the Permian anomaly. The creature is extremely fast, intelligent and has the potential for altering the current time line, so Lester agrees to an expedition to the Permian to guard the anomaly to the future.—Ron Kerrigan <mvg@whidbey.com>
